items.content_html: ArwaCloths is a clean and responsive eCommerce website designed using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. This project is a front-end design concept for an online clothing store. It includes essential features like product listings, category filters, and a modern user interface ‚Äì all built with lightweight, beginner-friendly technologies.

items.content_html: Pixel Color Detector is a lightweight web application that enables users to detect the exact color of any pixel in an uploaded image or a live webcam feed. It provides a visual color box and the corresponding RGB/HEX values when hovering over the canvas.
items.title: SowmyaKurapati26/pixel-colordetector: Pixel Color Detector is a lightweight web application that enables users to detect the exact color of any pixel in an uploaded image or a live webcam feed. It provides a visual color box and the corresponding RGB/HEX values when hovering over the canvas.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
